imdb.plot outline: Nuclear war brought earth to its fate over 500 years ago, radiation from the bombs has left a strange aura over the planet with many of the precious resources left with a supernatural feel to it. Terrah a female slaver sold to the evil Emancipator breaks the bonds from her chains and sets out on a blood debt to hunt down every person on her list that has done her wrong as she ends up in situations larger than she ever bargained for.
imdb.title: Terrah: The World of Exitium
plot: Nuclear war brought earth to its fate over 500 years ago, radiation from the bombs has left a strange aura over the planet with many of the precious resources left with a supernatural feel to it. Terrah a female slaver sold to the evil Emancipator breaks the bonds from her chains and sets out on a blood debt to hunt down every person on her list that has done her wrong as she ends up in situations larger than she ever bargained for.
